parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the vehicle to which the camera is attached.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[cameraOn]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_object = [[cameraOn]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[switchCamera]], [[cameraView]], [[cameraEffect]]
</value></part></template>
